title: Animal lover? This is the purrfect place for you! We are pet friendly!
posting_body: ['Skyridge Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '107 Skyridge Dr Woodstock, GA 30188', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', 'Please call', 'Unit Type:', 'Studio-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '288 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Dogs and Cats Allowed: $25 Monthly Pet Rent.', '$150 Fee. 2 Pet Limit.', 'Breed Restrictions.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Off-Street Parking', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Picnic Area', '✓ Quiet Neighborhood', '✓ Close to Local Elementary Schools', '✓ Close to Local High Schools', '✓ Easy Access to Highway 92 and 575', '✓ Grocery Stores Nearby', '✓ Less than 30 miles from Atlanta', '✓ Manicured, Paved Walk Ways', '✓ Mature Wooded Grounds', 'Description:', 'Welcome to Skyridge Apartments, where you can choose from a number of innovatively designed apartment homes.', "Surrounded by luxurious spaces, sunlight, and wonderful views, you'll find unlimited possibilities to reflect your lifestyle.", 'Discover the many ways to make Skyridge Apartments your home.', 'Skyridge Apartments is proudly managed by Peak Living.', 'At Peak Living, our mission is to provide the highest quality property management services in the industry.', 'We achieve this through our greatest asset; our people.', 'Our on-site and regional management teams offer unsurpassed customer service and local expertise for those living at our properties and for our clients.', 'Our experiences and entrepreneurial spirit mean that we understand that no two buildings or clients are the same, and as such, flexibility and adaptability are key to achieving investment goals.', 'Through the use of the latest technologies, Peak Living is able to provide exceptional accounting/reporting as well as industry leading portal functionality for prospective and current residents including digital lease signing, online work order submission, and online payments.', 'This unit comes with:', '✓ Air Conditioner', '✓ Carpeting', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Full Size Bath', '✓ Large Closets', '✓ New Black Appliances in Select Units', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ View', '✓ Washer/Dryer', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', '* Pricing subject to change, please contact us for details.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AFDD9B69931349']
